problem.markdown:
1. The use of ________ for high voltage applications is becoming more common.
(x) Polymer () Oil () Porcelain () All
2. DC supply __________ be used for the transformer.
(x) Connect () Can () Both Can and Connect
3. The ratio of secondary induced emf to primary induced emf is known as ___________
() Power ratio () Current ratio () All (x) Voltage transform ratio
4. The important characteristics of the fluid used in Circuit Breaker are :-
(x) All () It should have good thermal and chemical stability () It should have high dielectric strength and are extinguishing ability () Non- inflammability and high thermal conductivity
5. _________ is one of the best conductors due to its high electrical conductivity and high tensile strength for all type of transmission.
() Galvanised iron () Phosphor brown materials () Aluminium (x) Copper
problem.p: 1. The use of ________ for high voltage applications is becoming more common.
2. DC supply __________ be used for the transformer.
3. The ratio of secondary induced emf to primary induced emf is known as ___________
4. The important characteristics of the fluid used in Circuit Breaker are :-

choicegroup.choice: It should have good thermal and chemical stability
It should have high dielectric strength and are extinguishing ability
Non- inflammability and high thermal conductivity

problem.p: 5. _________ is one of the best conductors due to its high electrical conductivity and high tensile strength for all type of transmission.
